movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Puri Jagannadh
Starring by: Akash Puri, Neha Shetty, Vishu Reddy
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Roshan(Akash Puri) is a young man who always dreams of joining the army. This is also the time when a girl called Afreen(Neha Shetty) comes to India for her studies. The young couple crosses each other’s path only to find out that they have been reincarnated from the time of 1971 during the India-Pakistan war and have been separated in some dire circumstances.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Indraganti
Starring by: Adivi Sesh, Srinivas Avasarala, Eesha
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Gangadhar Rao(Tanikella Bharani) is strictly against his daughter’s(Esha) affair with Ananth(Adivi Sesh) and fixes her marriage with Sreechilipi(Vennela Kishore). This is also the time when Gangadhar’s son(Srinivasa Avasarala) is in love with his enemy’s daughter Maaya(Aditi). Upset with his kids, Gangadhar locks his daughter inside a room and kicks his son out of his house.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vikram K. Kumar
Written by: Harshavardhan, Vikram K. Kumar
Starring by: Akkineni Nageshwara Rao, Nagarjuna Akkineni, Naga Chaitanya Akkineni
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film starts off with a feud between a couple in Radha Mohan(Naga Chaitanya) and Krishnaveni(Samanta). They have a little son named Bittu. After a few days of problems in their marriage, the couple dies in a car accident. The small kid, Bittu grows on to become a rich and successful business man in Nageswara Rao(Nagarjuana). One fine day, Nageswara Rao gets the shock of his life, when he meets Nagarjuna(Naga Chaitanya) and Priya(Samanta). This immediately reminds him of his parents, and he then plans to develop love between the young couple and get them married. ​On the ​other hand, one fine day, Nageswara Rao accidentally helps an old man Chaitanya(ANR) and also meets Anjali(Shriya) in the hospital. This time it is a shock for Chaitanya, who sees Nageswara Rao and Anjali together.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Hari
Starring by: Vikram, Aishwarya Rajesh, Trisha Krishnan
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film begins a year after the events which occurred in the prequel Saamy. DCP Aarusaamy “Saamy” (Vikram), who had been transferred out of Tirunelveli, leads a happy life with his now-pregnant wife Bhuvana (Aishwarya Rajesh), who intends to pursue IAS. However, the people who were asking what happened to Perumal Pichai (Kota Srinivasa Rao) assume he might be in Sri Lanka with his second wife and 3 sons: Mahendra Pichai (O. A. K. Sundar), Devendra Pichai (John Vijay), and Raavana Pichai (Bobby Simha). Raavana soon finds out that Saamy killed his father. Saamy decides to go to Tirunelveli to stop Raavana.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Hanumantha Rao Raghavapudi
Starring by: Sharwanand, Sai Pallavi, Sunil
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: It’s a Telugu-speaking community in Kolkata where a rebellious youngster Surya falls for a medical student Vaishali. The love story isn’t as simple as it appears to be. Surya doesn’t let Vaishali realise his true identity. There’s an obvious conflict, there’s a natural disaster and a possible medical disorder too. How do these threads come together? Well, that’s the film for you in a nutshell.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Ravi Babu
Starring by: Ravi Babu, Abhishek Varma, Nabha Natesh
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Bunty, the little pink piglet is the apple of Chanti’s (Sathwik) eye. But what happens when this innocent little creature is embroiled with people who each have their own agenda to seek?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sampath V. Rudra
Starring by: Arjun Mahi, Duvvasi Mohan, Thagubothu Ramesh
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ishtangaa is a Telugu movie starring Arjun Mahi and Tanishq Rajan in prominent roles. The movie also stars Duvvasi Mohan, Thagubothu Ramesh and Madhunandan. It is a drama directed by Sampath V. Rudra with P. Venkateshwer Rao as producer, forming part of the crew.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kunal Kohli
Starring by: Sundeep Kishan, Tamannaah Bhatia, Navdeep
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Tammy(Tamannah) is a modern girl who breaks up with her boyfriend as he does not believe in true love. This is the time, she meets Sanju(Sundeep Kishan) and connects with him instantly. They start living together but Tammy is against a physical relationship with Sanju. This upsets Sanju and he breaks up with Tammy. During this time, Sanju meets another girl and Tammy starts liking Krish(Navdeep).

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Srinivas Chakravarthi
Starring by: Naga Shaurya, Kashmira, Yamini Bhaskar
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film opens with a priest suggesting a guy that his son would have a husband and not a wife in the future. A worried father doesn’t discuss this with the son or the family, but things take a strange turn sooner.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kookie Vikas Gulati
Written by: Shiraz Ahmed, Sameer Anjaan
Starring by: Vivek Oberoi, Isaiah, Aruna Shields
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: PRINCE It’s Showtime Nothing and No One Can Be Trusted One of the savviest thieves in the world commits the biggest heist of his life. He wakes up next morning to realize he has a gunshot wound on his arm that he doesn’t remember getting. In his quest to find answers he discovers his name is Prince, he used to work for a man named Sarang and his girlfriend’s name is Maya. He is being hunted by the secret service of India- I Grip, the CBI and the biggest white collared criminals in the world. He is the most wanted man in the country because only he knows the whereabouts of the heist, which contains a secret that is linked not only to his loss of memory but threatens the future of the Human Race. Prince can rely only on his razor sharp instincts to salvage himself. The web of deception spins and Prince gets even more entangled. Nothing and no one can be trusted.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sankalp Reddy
Written by: Sankalp Reddy, Niranjan Reddy
Starring by: Rana Daggubati, Kay Kay Menon, Atul Kulkarni
Genres: Drama, History, Thriller, War
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: In 1971, amid rising tensions between India and Pakistan over the liberation war of East Pakistan, Pakistan navy, in a top secret mission, plans an attack on Indian majestic-class aircraft carrier INS Vikrant, to gain control over the waters of Bay of Bengal. They send their best-in-class submarine PNS Ghazi, but are intercepted by an Indian submarine INS Karanj (S21). An underwater attack ensues.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Matthew Robbins
Written by: Hal Barwood, Matthew Robbins
Starring by: Peter MacNicol, Caitlin Clarke, Ralph Richardson
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy
Country: USA
Language: English
movieDescription: A King has made a pact with a dragon where he sacrfices virgins to it, and the dragon leaves his kingdom alone. An old wizard, and his keen young apprentice volunteer to kill the dragon and attempt to save the next virgin in line, the King’s own daughter.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Maha Venkatesh
Written by: Maha Venkatesh, Maha Venkatesh
Starring by: Mohan Bhagath, Praveena Paruchuri, Praneetha
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film is set in the native village of Kancharapalem which is conservative and has its own share of issues. From the love story of a 50-year-old unmarried man to a youngster who falls for a prostitute, this film showcases many other subplots. Different other stories like inter-caste love affair and a moving story of a sculptor are showcased in an interesting manner.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Tharun Bhascker Dhaassyam
Starring by: Vishwaksen Naidu, Sushanth Reddy, Abhinav Gomatam
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ee Nagaraniki Emaindi based on the lives of four friends who meet after a long time and end up in Goa because of a weird incident. Each have their own dream careers, and collaborate to make a short film. There, one more small incident leads them to enter a short film making contest.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Arun Vaidyanathan
Written by: Anand Raghav, Arun Vaidyanathan
Starring by: Arjun Sarja, Prasanna, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar
Genres: Action, Crime, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telguu
movieDescription: Ranjith Kalidoss(Arjun) is the deputy superintendent of police who is a master in solving intense crime cases. One fine day, he along with his team (Prasanna and Varalakshmi) take up a high-profile case which involves a series of murders. After each murder, the culprit throws a challenge to the police by leaving clues to his next crime.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Arivazhagan Venkatachalam
Written by: Rajesh Kumar, Arivazhagan Venkatachalam
Starring by: Arun Vijay, Abhinaya, Aishwarya
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The movie opens with Jessica (Misha Ghoshal) confessing her sins to a priest at a church. The priest is then murdered while Jessica is abducted. In the city, ACP Vetrimaaran (Arun Vijay) is celebrating his brother Aravind (Amit Bhargav) and sister-in-law Abhinaya’s (Abhinaya) wedding anniversary. Everyone in the family is happy except for Vetri’s mother, who berates Abhinaya for not bearing her a grandchild. After undergoing treatment by a famous fertility specialist Dr. Tulsi (Kalyani Natarajan), Abhinaya finally becomes pregnant.
